TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWorkflowDebugger

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Defines the interface that receives workflow instance creation, execution, and termination status information from a object running inside the workflow host application.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
This interface is implemented by a .NET remoting object hosted by the debugger.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ActivityStatusChanged (Guid programId, Guid scheduleTypeId, Guid instanceId, string activityQualifiedName, string hierarchicalActivityId, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus status, int stateReaderId);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ActivityStatusChanged(valuetype System.Guid programId, valuetype System.Guid scheduleTypeId, valuetype System.Guid instanceId, string activityQualifiedName, string hierarchicalActivityId, valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus status, int32 stateReaderId) cil managed

Docs.param: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
A <xref:System.String> containing the qualified name of the parent activity.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionStatus%2A> of the current activity.
An <xref:System.Int32> containing the activity execution context ID associated with the current activity.
Docs.summary: Called when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionStatus%2A> of an activity within the workflow changes.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AssemblyLoaded (Guid programId, string assemblyPath, bool fromGlobalAssemblyCache);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AssemblyLoaded(valuetype System.Guid programId, string assemblyPath, bool fromGlobalAssemblyCache) cil managed

Docs.param: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a instance.
A <xref:System.String> containing the path on disk from where the assembly is loaded
A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the assembly is loaded from the global assembly cache.
Docs.summary: Called when an assembly is loaded in the app domain corresponding to the in the workflow host application.

An <xref:System.Int32> containing the activity execution context ID associated with the current activity.
Docs.summary: Called before the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionStatus%2A> of an activity within the workflow changes.

MemberSignature.Value: public void BeforeHandlerInvoked (Guid programId, Guid scheduleTypeId, string activityQualifiedName, System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.ActivityHandlerDescriptor handlerMethod);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void BeforeHandlerInvoked(valuetype System.Guid programId, valuetype System.Guid scheduleTypeId, string activityQualifiedName, valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.ActivityHandlerDescriptor handlerMethod) cil managed

Docs.param: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
An that contains the information regarding the code-beside handler method that is about to be invoked.
Docs.summary: Called before a handler in the code-beside is about to be invoked.

MemberSignature.Value: public void HandlerInvoked (Guid programId, Guid instanceId, int threadId, string activityQualifiedName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void HandlerInvoked(valuetype System.Guid programId, valuetype System.Guid instanceId, int32 threadId, string activityQualifiedName) cil managed

Docs.param: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a instance.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
An <xref:System.Int32> containing the ID of the thread on which the handler was invoked.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
Docs.summary: Called after a handler in the code-beside is invoked.

MemberSignature.Value: public void InstanceCompleted (Guid programId, Guid instanceId);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InstanceCompleted(valuetype System.Guid programId, valuetype System.Guid instanceId) cil managed

Docs.param: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a instance.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
Docs.summary: Called when a workflow instance completes.

MemberSignature.Value: public void InstanceCreated (Guid programId, Guid instanceId, Guid scheduleTypeId);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InstanceCreated(valuetype System.Guid programId, valuetype System.Guid instanceId, valuetype System.Guid scheduleTypeId) cil managed

Docs.param: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a instance.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
Docs.summary: Called when a workflow instance is created.

MemberSignature.Value: public void InstanceDynamicallyUpdated (Guid programId, Guid instanceId, Guid scheduleTypeId);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InstanceDynamicallyUpdated(valuetype System.Guid programId, valuetype System.Guid instanceId, valuetype System.Guid scheduleTypeId) cil managed

Docs.param: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a instance.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
Docs.summary: Called when the workflow instance is dynamically updated with a workflow change.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ScheduleTypeLoaded (Guid programId, Guid scheduleTypeId, string assemblyFullName, string fileName, string md5Digest, bool isDynamic, string scheduleNamespace, string scheduleName, string workflowMarkup);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ScheduleTypeLoaded(valuetype System.Guid programId, valuetype System.Guid scheduleTypeId, string assemblyFullName, string fileName, string md5Digest, bool isDynamic, string scheduleNamespace, string scheduleName, string workflowMarkup) cil managed

Docs.param: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.String> containing the assembly name from which the workflow type was loaded.
A <xref:System.String> containing the full path of the markup file corresponding to the workflow, or if the workflow type was a code-only workflow.
A <xref:System.String> containing the md5 hash code for the workflow markup definition, or if the workflow type was a code-only workflow.
A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the workflow definition was modified dynamically.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the workflow type.
A <xref:System.String> containing the workflow type name.
A <xref:System.String> containing the XAML serialized format of the workflow type.
Docs.summary: Called when a new workflow type is loaded by the workflow runtime engine in the workflow host application.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetInitialActivityStatus (Guid programId, Guid scheduleTypeId, Guid instanceId, string activityQualifiedName, string hierarchicalActivityId, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus status, int stateReaderId);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetInitialActivityStatus(valuetype System.Guid programId, valuetype System.Guid scheduleTypeId, valuetype System.Guid instanceId, string activityQualifiedName, string hierarchicalActivityId, valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus status, int32 stateReaderId) cil managed

Docs.param: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
A <xref:System.String> containing the qualified name of the parent activity.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionStatus%2A> of the current activity.
An <xref:System.Int32> containing the activity execution context ID associated with the current activity.
Docs.summary: Called to set the initial status of the activities in a workflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is called when a workflow instance is loaded from a persistence store or when the debugger is attached to a workflow host that has workflow instance already running.

MemberSignature.Value: public void UpdateHandlerMethodsForActivity (Guid programId, Guid scheduleTypeId, string activityQualifiedName, System.Collections.Generic.List<System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.ActivityHandlerDescriptor> handlerMethods);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UpdateHandlerMethodsForActivity(valuetype System.Guid programId, valuetype System.Guid scheduleTypeId, string activityQualifiedName, class System.Collections.Generic.List`1<valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.ActivityHandlerDescriptor> handlerMethods) cil managed

Docs.param: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of handlers associated with an activity.
Docs.summary: Called when an activity enters the Executing state.
